scripts.validate: node -e "const Ajv=require('ajv');const fs=require('fs');const ajv=new Ajv({allErrors:true});const schema=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('schema.clinic.json'));const data=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('public/clinics.json'));if(!ajv.validate(schema,data)){console.error(ajv.errors);process.exit(1)}console.log('schema ok')"
